Package com.facebook.logging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Logger
    Facebook logging interface that is similar to log4j, but adds delayed format processing
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustodianDailyRollingFileAppender
    CustodianDailyRollingFileAppender is based on org.apache.log4j.appender.DailyRollingFileAppender so most of the configuration options can be taken from the documentation on that class.
    LoggerImpl
    Logger with efficient var-args support.
    TimeSamplingLog4jLogger
    Logger wrapper to down-sample frequent logs to one log per specified time
    TimeSamplingLogger
    decorates a FacebookLogger with the ability to sample logging at a specified window size (1 per time specified)
